detail_desc: Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit. Turn-up hem with a small fabric appliqué.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif and beaded appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline.

Calf-length dress in a jacquard weave with a round neckline and an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Short, wide raglan sleeves with narrow trims, a seam with drawstrings at the waist and a gathered seam around the skirt for added width. Jersey lining.
Hats in soft organic cotton jersey with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Cargo trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted jacket in slightly stretchy fabric with a satin shawl lapels, a covered button at the front and flap front pockets. Decorative, covered buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Straight-style blouse in soft, double-layered cotton with embroidery. V-neck with ties at the top and long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Set containing earrings and ear cuffs in metal decorated with glass rhinestones. One pair of hoop earrings and five ear cuffs.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, front pockets and slits in the sides. No buttons.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Elasticated fabric belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.
Knee-length Bermuda shorts in imitation leather with a high waist, pleats at the front, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener and diagonal front pockets.
One-shoulder sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide elasticated hem. Lined. Light support.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch flexible denim for maximum mobility. Hard-worn details that are patched on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
T-shirt in soft velour.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif and reflective details.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a print motif at the top, long sleeves and a longer layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shaping. 5-pocket bootcut jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist with a zip fly and button.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a lace-covered V-neck front and back.
Sun visor in braided straw with contrasting colour elastic at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with a jersey-lined hood, buttons down the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Round-necked T-shirt in cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave. Regular waist with concealed elastication, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Trainers in canvas with a padded top edge and tongue, lacing at the front, and imitation leather heel caps. Imitation leather linings, fabric insoles and patterned rubber soles.
No-show trainer socks in mesh with a silicone trim on the inside of the heels to hold them in place.

Short dress in chiffon and flock-print mesh. Round neckline with an opening and ties at the front and long puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a small frill trim and gathered tiers on the skirt for added width and soft draping. Partly lined in jersey.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and decorative buttons at the top. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, small jetted coin pocket at the front, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Tapered legs with narrow hems.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Fitted shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour trim. High waist with covered elastication and rounded hems.
Double-layered tulle skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Satin lining.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in sturdy jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly with buttons, side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Necklace in shiny metal with large chain links and an adjustable fastening. The zinc content of the necklace is recycled.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in woven fabric with back pockets and a smocked high waist with a frill trim.
Maxi dress in softly draping satin in a narrow cut at the top with a V-shaped opening at the neckline and an elasticated drawstring waist. Lined bodice.
Fitted polo-neck top in ribbed jersey with a cut-out section at the back and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with embroidery on the front and sleeves. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood that wraps over slightly at the front, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Fitted, long-sleeved jumper in a rib knit with a small stand-up collar.
Calf-length slip dress in softly draping satin with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft sweatshirt fabric with a shawl collar, buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Wide foldover ribbing at the cuffs and a ribbed hem. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a unique nursing feature, slightly wider neckline and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Slim-fit joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and stripes down the sides of the legs.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with decorative gathers at the back and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist.
Pyjamas in soft cotton flannel. Shirt-style top with long sleeves, a chest pocket and slits in the sides. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom at the top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles at the top and a magnetic fastener. One large inner compartment, one smaller compartment and a zipped pocket. Unlined. Size approx. 12x30x35 cm.
Fitted jumper in soft, rib-knit cashmere with slits in the sides. Long, gently flared sleeves with knitted loops and slits and ties at the cuffs.
Round-necked T-shirt in airy linen jersey.
Satin-covered Alice band with floral decorations on top.
Top in soft, printed fleece with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted top with extra-long sleeves and decorative seams down the front and back.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a tie belt, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Pleats at the top, concealed pockets in the side seams, fake back pockets and straight legs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and a low crotch.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, V-neck at the front, yoke at the back, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with long sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up with a small appliqué at the hem.

Short, cold shoulder dress in a viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and a wide lace trim at the top and hem. Unlined.
Round, rimless sunglasses with decorative plastic beads on the sidepieces and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey with a square neckline at the front, medium coverage at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Gently tailored jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front, welt front pockets with a flap, and a single back vent. Lined.
Turban in a soft rib knit.
Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric. Lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and high slits in the sides. Soft brushed inside.

Short-sleeved shirt in soft poplin made from a cotton and viscose blend with a turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Headband in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with a knot at the front.

Oversized shorts in cotton twill. High waist with covered elastication at the back and pleats at the front, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, knee-length legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Double-layered tube scarf in jersey.
